mapper.sql: file_id, file_type, file_size, file_name, file_url, extension, file_note, date_created, create_ip, create_id, keyword, version, invalid_time, del_flag
mapper.select: select fi.file_id, fi.file_type, fi.file_size, fi.file_name, fi.file_url, fi.extension, fi.file_note, fi.date_created, fi.create_ip, fi.create_id, fi.keyword, fi.version, fi.invalid_time, fi.del_flag from tc_file fi inner join tc_file_link link on fi.file_id = link.file_id where link.link_id = #{linkId}
mapper.insert: insert into tc_file (file_id, file_type, file_size, file_name, file_url, extension, file_note, date_created, create_ip, create_id, keyword, version, invalid_time, del_flag) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date_created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invalid_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{del_flag,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into tc_file
file_id,
file_type,
file_size,
file_name,
file_url,
extension,
file_note,
date_created,
create_ip,
create_id,
keyword,
version,
invalid_time,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update tc_file
file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extension = #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_note = #{fileNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_created = #{date_created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_ip = #{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{create_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invalid_time = #{invalid_time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tc_file set file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extension = #{extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_note = #{fileNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_created = #{date_created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_ip = #{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{create_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invalid_time = #{invalid_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=CHAR} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
